Subject: Re: Rude Awakening
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

The larger robot, the only one not out cold, crawled towards the frozen red
robot. "Huhhh, Cliffjumper, you okay" he said hopefully, "Come on, talk to
me" he then followed, now sounding desperate. He then started to crawl over
to the blue one who had hit his head hard, "Beachcomber not you to, ohhhhhh
man, why you guys?" he said with his life shattering around him, they where
his friends, and now they may be dead. No he couldnt think about that
possiblity. His hopes lifted when he heard what sounded like jet engines
(prowl's boosters) coming. He tried to lift himself, but his legs had been
damaged from the liquid nitrogen.
